title: Should I become a Memer...?
body: I'm at 3.9k Lifetime votes. I don't even know what I've done to get this much and an idea came to my head... Should I become a Memer...? I feel the amount of time I will have to put and also the downvotes I will see from my petty jokes will be saddening. Oh yeah, main thing is I don't know how to GIF so that's probably one big thing. Thoughts my fellow Memers and do you think you guys need *another one?*

replies.body:
One does not simply "Meme".

The memes call to you, it is up to you to answer.

Whenever you come up with something, just post it. Don't worry about upvotes/downvotes. As for the Gifs, you don't have to create them. You could use already existing ones, like in this website [Giphy](http://giphy.com) . Oh and I love bad jokes...like Diana level of them lol

https://cdn.meme.am/instances/500x/52096826.jpg
There are never enough memers

One does not become a memer by choice, the choice is thrusted upon them, their desire to shit post and cause lols take over

Chaos over takes their soul and they are infected with a lust for posting and loling

Though many receive the calling, only a handful are truly granted it

https://tse2.mm.bing.net/th?id=OIP.M8431ed4ffcdf26225c310e6649f77688o0&pid=15.1
One does not become a memer... We are all born into it. You just have to accept that you are.
Getting a lot of upvotes is EZ. Just spam. Look at my upvotes, and yet no one likes me >:3 it's like champion mastery.
I honestly have no idea how I got to 25k. I suppose getting downvotes doesn't subtract from the total lol
I wasn't born that you were already spamming.

https://media.giphy.com/media/VLoN2iW8ii3wA/giphy.gif

As for how to gif, just open the gif in its own tab, copy the url, and paste it here. If it is from imgur, add ?noredirect

I would reccommennd giphy as a good place to get started finding dank gifs

go my friend, dunk the memes, DUNKKKKKKKKKKKKK
{{champion:122}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:122}}
also just hold on to the picture with your mouse and drag it into the comment
Don't.
Are you jelly by any chance? Get it!? Nevermind...
Why?
Yee.
Haw?
no, bop

http://m.imgur.com/gallery/dac74Al?noredirect
And if you need any help in posting gifs or anything just ask me.

Here's the question.

Why do you wish to meme?

For myself the answer was simple. I wanted to make people laugh, or at least crack a smile.

I just see the upvotes as me having had success. I never asked for them, and I only see them as people showing that they liked what I posted.

Memeing isn't about spamming. It's about finding the things we can all relate to or that many of us can have a laugh at, and sharing it.

Basically, being a memer isn't about yourself, but rather about everyone and having a good time.
If you must ask, you will never know.
The answer is always Karthus.
You are not special. You are not a beautiful or unique snowflake. You're the same decaying organic matter as everything else
No
